content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each employee should fill in Time Journal in\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://jira.epam.com/jira/secure/TempoUserBoard!timesheet.jspa\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"JIRA\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", where he/she can report time for activities he/she was engaged in during the day. Detailed instructions about that can be found in article “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHELP/Time+reporting+in+JIRA\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Time reporting in JIRA\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"”.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here are some major rules to be followed while filling in TJ:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TJ should be filled in by the end of the working day!!!! Exceptional cases are: JIRA unavailability, some rare cases when you do have to leave urgentl In this case TJ should be filled next mornin\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have some generic tasks, for which time should be reporte For each of the tasks you should report time spent for this task, some of them are:Check your TJs on the last day of the month both in PMC and in JIRA as sometimes there may be issues with TJ activities synchronization from JIRA to PM In this case Incident should be created for EPAM - Service Desk Processing Center team to fix the proble\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Knowledge Transfer for XXX\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": This task is created for each newcomer for probation perio Here you should report time spent for studying info on Service Des\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Studying of workflow changes and updates - daily Imp review, HD Weekly status meeting:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"our status meetings each Wednesday and other meetings related to SD activities (presentations of new processes, knowledge transfer meetings, et). Do not report here time for requests processing, monitoring, knowledge transfer, et\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Monitoring - Backup:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"time you spend each day on backup or on call monitoring activitie You have to report actual time spent on monitoring, , you have 3 backup or on call monitoring duties planned for the day, 5 h of planned monitoring, but you have actually spent 5 h (registering phone calls after monitoring, et), so 5 h should be reported for monitoring tas\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Monitoring – Balancer:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"time you spend each day on Balancer monitoring activitie You have to report actual time spent on monitoring, you have 3 Balancer monitoring duties planned for the day, 5 h of planned monitoring, but you have actually spent 5 h (, there was an overload in the requests queue, et), so 5 h should be reported for monitoring tas\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Talk with my manager/coordinator (evaluation, career path conversations, performance reviews with Curator/Resource Manager to help SD member improve professional skills and develop further career growt\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project Management is responsible for checking TJs, generating reports and marking all OVTs and “underworked” hours during the period 1-4 day of each month. Thus incorrectly filled in TJs really cause problems.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case of any questions, please feel free to contact your Curator, Manager or Project Coordinators.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
